'''Spur Gear C''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained from a [[chest]] in the eastern part of the [[Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering Region]]. It is used for the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] "[[Fireworks Atop a Meka]]".
